articles.title: Minnesota Lynx celebrate Sylvia Fowles in last regular-season home game ahead of WNBA legend's retirement
articles.description: Fans, teammates past and present, and admiring opponents were all on hand Friday night to celebrate Minnesota Lynx and WNBA legend Sylvia Fowles in her last regular-season home game before retirement.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS -- As the Target Center crowd chanted "Syl's House!" and teammates and opponents alike looked on with pride, Minnesota Lynx center Sylvia Fowles soaked up the affection here Friday night.… [+6608 chars]

articles.title: Rory Sabbatini to keep full PGA Tour card after reworked rankings following LIV Golf fallout
articles.description: Rory Sabbatini will move from No. 31 on the PGA Tour career money list to No. 22 after LIV Golf suspensions and resignations take effect, meaning he can use an exemption and have a full PGA Tour card for next season.

MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- Rory Sabbatini can get a full PGA Tour card for next season, courtesy of the players who have signed up with Saudi-funded LIV Golf and have been suspended.

articles.title: Journeyman Wynton Bernard keys Colorado Rockies win after 10 seasons in minors
articles.description: Wynton Bernard, who spent the last 10 years in the minor leagues, had a memorable Major League debut by singling and stealing a base in the Colorado Rockies' 5-3 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks on Friday night.
articles.content:
DENVER -- Wynton Bernard finally got his chance to play in the major leagues a decade after he was drafted by the San Diego Padres.
